name: Brain Dots: Game Draw Line
description:
Let's draw lines and bump dots!
This is a brain-training game that everyone from children to grown-ups to relax and brainstorm.

◆ How to play:
Draw lines and shapes freely to move and roll the balls.
Flexible thinking is going to become the key to victory.
Make the blue and red dots bump.
Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution

◆ Features:
Hint: helps you to resolve the level.
Video: views video to get hints.
Restart: starts over the level.
All free, just play and relax.

As this game includes the elements of riddle and “Escape the Room” type of games, we would recommend Brain Dots to who enjoy brain-type puzzles, cards and strategy games.

I hope you enjoy brain dots - draw line game!
